name: Tapey In The Lab
description:
Tapey In The Lab

Is a simple retro style game where you play as a main character Tapey and try to finish all the levels howewer whenever tapey finishes the level it gets rewinded and tapey needs to complete it again but this time blindly so you need to find a solution and remember layouts of platforms and obstacles to help tapey survive in this scary place

Controls

Left and Right Arrow - movement

Space x2 - Double Jump
